title: Experience
body:
__Office Manager__ | Marinelli Auto Service (Aug 2017 - Dec 2018)

+ Responsible for day to day operations, such as finances, growth, customer service and business planning.
+ Created proprietary application for Marinelli Auto that has significantly increased productivity and efficiency
+ Implemented Deming's 14 points of process improvement

title: Education
body:
__Full Stack JavaScript__ | Treehouse Online (2014 - 2018)
+ Completed track for front end web development and full stack JavaScript
+ Also completed courses on Ruby on Rails, Python, and Swift

__Management Quality Index Graduate__ | Enterprise Holdings (2010 - 2011)
+ Completed corporate certification for management which included training in: risk management, profitability, sales/marketing, and accounting
+ Offered a management job within a week due to my performance (usually takes 1 - 2 years)

__BA in Social Science__ (focus on Religious Studies) | University of South Florida (2005 - 2009)
+ President of my organization that we grew from 20 people to over 250
+ Placed on academic probation twice (you're only allowed to be on it twice)
+ Dean's list of trouble makers

title: Skills
body:
+ Public speaking
+ JavaScript full stack developer (Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Express, Node.js, Mongodb, AngularJS)
